name: Vacation Simulator 4.13
description:
You have once again managed to get trapped somewhere.

At least you're on vacation this time!

Vacation Simulator 4.13 is another entry in a series of text-based interactive fiction inspired by point-and-click games and escape games. Your goal is simple: get out of your rental cabin. You might also want to cause as little damage as possible, but that's a secondary problem. (At least you're pretty sure it is…)
